info.name: Dhurn Companions
info.description: Companion creatures from the Dhurn Toldur campaign.
info.author: mazetree

setters.set: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

description.p: The steed can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the steed bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the steed and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

description.p: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

description.p: Fey Step (1/Day): Bonus Action The animal, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

sheet.description: Fey Step (1/Day): Bonus Action The animal, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
